summary: The diff implements REQ-1 by filtering out Creator messages without media in ChatArea.tsx. However, the requirement specifies modifying 'room card display logic' while the implementation modifies the chat message display logic within a room. This appears to be a misinterpretation of the requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Modify the room card display logic to only show the Creator message for rooms that were created with media
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation filters Creator messages in ChatArea.tsx (the chat interface inside a room), but REQ-1 explicitly states 'room card display logic' which refers to ChatroomCard.tsx (the preview cards shown in the lobby). No changes were made to ChatroomCard.tsx.

hallucinated_features.description: Filtering Creator messages within the chat message list based on presence of media
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement asks to modify room card display logic (the preview/summary shown in lobby), not to filter messages within the chat itself. ChatArea.tsx shows messages inside an opened room, not the room card preview.
